price: 55. Mpe esika ya bosembo yakofanda pene na mokonzi wa bokoki (Allah).
arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fī maqʿadi ṣid'qin ʿinda malīkin muq'tadirin
